sentences.sContent: Caffeine constricts the blood vessels in your body.
sentences.sCn: 咖啡因会使体内的血管收缩。

sentences.sContent: Linda’s throat constricted and she started to cry.
sentences.sCn: 琳达喉咙发紧，哭了起来。

remMethod.val: con + strict(拉紧) → 拉到一起 → 收缩

words.tran: 紧缩的；束紧的；压缩性的
收缩；压缩；紧窄感；压缩物
大蟒；括约肌；使压缩之物

trans.tranOther: to make something narrower or tighter, or to become narrower or tighter
